      • widgetSelected

        public void widgetSelected(org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionEvent e)
        Updates values on a button click and enables/disables buttons. The flow of events:
        UsePath -> enables IG search options (over hierarchy)
        Follow Assignments -> enables depth
        -> controls R/W checkbox shape (cannot do both when following assignments)
        Depth -> disables Search button when contains bad value
        Specified by:
        widgetSelected in interface org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener
